data.author: Jack Nicklaus
data.quote: Success depends almost entirely on how effectively you learn to manage the game's two ultimate adversaries: the course and yourself.

data.author: Nargis Fakhri
data.quote: At the end of the day, the one commonality that both Hindi cinema and Hollywood share is that they are full of talented and inspirational people. Outside of this, there are many differences, from the scheduling and rehearsal to promotion and directing techniques.

data.author: Junipero Serra
data.quote: I pray God may preserve your health and life many years.

data.author: Alan Alda
data.quote: Be brave enough to live life creatively. The creative place where no one else has ever been.

data.author: Henri Matisse
data.quote: An artist must never be a prisoner. Prisoner? An artist should never be a prisoner of himself, prisoner of style, prisoner of reputation, prisoner of success, etc.

data.author: James Daly
data.quote: People say we were an overnight success. It took us a year to be an overnight success.

data.author: David Cameron
data.quote: I have no time for those who say there is no way Scotland could go it alone. I know first-hand the contribution Scotland and Scots make to Britain's success - so for me there's no question about whether Scotland could be an independent nation.

data.author: Ray Kroc
data.quote: While formal schooling is an important advantage, it is not a guarantee of success nor is its absence a fatal handicap.

data.author: Pablo Neruda
data.quote: The books that help you most are those which make you think that most. The hardest way of learning is that of easy reading; but a great book that comes from a great thinker is a ship of thought, deep freighted with truth and beauty.

data.author: Rahul Dravid
data.quote: What drew me towards team sport were the camaraderie and friendship. The chance to celebrate victory and success with a group of other people is something I have enjoyed doing.

data.author: Aeschylus
data.quote: God loves to help him who strives to help himself.

data.author: Tony Gwynn
data.quote: Steroids do not guarantee you're going to have success. I think a lot of people think that they will, but they don't.

data.author: Benjamin Disraeli
data.quote: One secret of success in life is for a man to be ready for his opportunity when it comes.

data.author: John W. Snow
data.quote: Telecom is a dramatic success in India and our view is, respecting the political process, and respecting the fact that these are sovereign decisions, is that, approaching India as a friend.

data.author: Arthur Ashe
data.quote: Success is a journey, not a destination. The doing is often more important than the outcome.

data.author: Aeschylus
data.quote: Obedience is the mother of success and is wedded to safety.

data.author: Gloria Vanderbilt
data.quote: I've always believed that one woman's success can only help another woman's success.

data.author: John Burroughs
data.quote: A somebody was once a nobody who wanted to and did.

data.author: Jack Welch
data.quote: Before you are a leader, success is all about growing yourself. When you become a leader, success is all about growing others.

data.author: Gustave Flaubert
data.quote: Success is a consequence and must not be a goal.

data.author: Victor Kiam
data.quote: Even if you fall on your face, you're still moving forward.

data.author: Earl Nightingale
data.quote: Success is the progressive realization of a worthy goal or ideal.

data.author: Robert Collier
data.quote: Your chances of success in any undertaking can always be measured by your belief in yourself.

data.author: Bruce Lee
data.quote: Always be yourself, express yourself, have faith in yourself, do not go out and look for a successful personality and duplicate it.

data.author: Anupam Kher
data.quote: I started doing motivational tours. I've seen all kinds of people, from the CEOs to the lowest executive, opening up to their fears. We don't introspect as much as we should.
